input.sentences: last weekend | two of my best friends got married and i attended the ceremony .
here is the lovely couple walking down the aisle after exchanging vows .
in this picture | they are on the way to visit with family and friends .
it was clear that the entire atmosphere was very loving and cheerful .
output.sentences: It is the weekend and the man and wife are getting married in front of their family and friends.
The lovely couple is walking down the aisle to share there vows.
The happy couple take pictures and visit with their family and friends.
The loving family are very cheerful and the entire wedding was perfect..
The newly weds are finally married and every tells them congratulations
